# conversor-moedas

Description. 
The package conversor-moedas is used to:
	- Convert currency
	- Get currency rate

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install conversor-moedas

```bash
pip install conversor-moedas
```
